reviewText: I use (sometimes) Shadow Dancers at my DJ gigs when I DJ the proper place not going to use these at a graduation party I have a projection unit and put this on a rear projection screen (like a bed sheet) and looks nice.
The performers aren't who they claim they are in DVD? Not worth the cost for that display. Not attention grabbing music but dancers can be generic in shadow?

I saw this at a party in the Hollywood hills, people were actually sitting aroung watching network tv until a guy popped this in the DVD player and at last people got up and had a great time. Try it, you'll see.
